definition: big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
helpless/without choice/for lack of better option/grudgingly/willy-nilly/nolens volens/abbr. for 無可奈何|无可奈何[wu2 ke3 nai4 he2]
have no way out/have no alternative/abbr. to 無奈|无奈[wu2 nai4]
to do something to sb/to deal with/to cope/how?/to no avail
to have no way out/to have no alternative
Nara, an old capital of Japan
Naiman banner or Naiman khoshuu in Tongliao 通遼|通辽[Tong1 liao2], Inner Mongolia
to have no alternative/to be helpless
Chennai, capital of southeast Indian state Tamil Nadu 泰米爾納德邦|泰米尔纳德邦[Tai4 mi3 er3 Na4 de2 bang1]/formerly called Madras 馬德拉斯|马德拉斯[Ma3 de2 la1 si1]

sentences.english: Josh and Zuleika hear the scream through the trees.
sentences.chinese: 傑克和奈提莉聽到有尖叫聲穿過樹林。

sentences.english: In addition, nevirapine has proven to be problematic.
sentences.chinese: 在此外，奈韋拉平已被證明是有問題的。

sentences.english: But it costs twice the price of nevirapine.
sentences.chinese: 但是它的費用是奈韋拉平的2倍。

sentences.english: The activity of nevirapine does not compete with template or nucleoside triphosphates.
sentences.chinese: 奈韋拉平不與底物或三磷酸核苷產生競爭。

sentences.english: The NIST circuit lasted only around 10 nanoseconds.
sentences.chinese: NIST的線路則只持續了約10奈秒。

sentences.english: Malone knew that hundreds of books existed on Rennes.
sentences.chinese: 馬龍知道關於裏奈已經有了幾百本書。

sentences.english: JAKE and NEYTIRI stand before the gathered members of ANOTHER CLAN.
sentences.chinese: 傑克和奈提莉站在另一部落聚集的族人面前。

sentences.english: Neytiri takes the end of her queue and raises it.
sentences.chinese: 奈提莉用手輕握她辮子的末端，將它擡起。

sentences.english: The nevirapine is contained in a small dropper placed inside the pouch.
sentences.chinese: 奈韋拉平是包含在這裏面的小袋放置了一個小滴管。

sentences.english: The drug company Boehringer Ingelheim developed nevirapine.
sentences.chinese: 勃林格殷格翰公司的藥物開發奈韋拉平。

sentences.english: JAKE SEARCHES for Neytiri amid swirling smoke and sparks.
sentences.chinese: 傑克在翻滾的濃煙和火焰中尋找着奈提莉。

sentences.english: Nevirapine is a kind of effective medicine cured AIDS.
sentences.chinese: 奈韋拉平是一種有效的治療艾滋病的藥物。

sentences.english: NEYTIRI and JAKE crawl through the undergrowth. She points
sentences.chinese: 奈提莉和傑克爬過一個矮樹叢。

sentences.english: Zuleika grabs Josh's hand and pulls him into the circle of dancers.
sentences.chinese: 奈提莉抓住傑克的手，把他拉到舞者中間。

sentences.english: Jake walks through the crowd, straight to Neytiri at the foot of the dais.
sentences.chinese: 傑克穿過人羣，直直地走向站在祭臺下的奈提莉。

definition: helpless/without choice/for lack of better option/grudgingly/willy-nilly/nolens volens/abbr. for 無可奈何|无可奈何[wu2 ke3 nai4 he2]
have no way out/have no alternative/abbr. to 無奈|无奈[wu2 nai4]
to do something to sb/to deal with/to cope/how?/to no avail
to lose (sth)/to drop (sth)/to feel a sense of loss/frustrated/disappointment/loss
to regret/to feel that it is a great pity/to feel sorry for sb
